name: InstaBetter
author: Jake0oo0
description: The most comprehensive tweak for Instagram yet.

1.1.1: Fix bug with zooming on short captions
1.1.2: Fix crash related to no captions
1.1.3: Fix invalid ringer state on load
Replace 'Save Media' and 'Share' with new buttons under images and videos
1.1.4: Add minor change to possibly lower memory usage
Fix crash when viewing profile image in activity tab
Fix share/save images not showing on 6+ - s/o to ThisBeChrisSas for testing
1.2.0: Revert to old style of Saving/Sharing. Now more consistent
Fix both Twitter buttons opening to the same page
Add preferences view to Instagram's settings
Add ability to customize whether or not to auto play videos
Fix zoom/share attempting to display several times
1.3.0: Fix muting not working for some users
Revamp custom locations. Now select a location from a map, add a name and address.
Add a toggle for displaying buttons or action sheet for saving/sharing
Add confirmation to saving content with save button
Remove activity from muted users from the activity feed. Only removes items where just a single user is involved.
Add action list to DM photos rather than immediately zooming. Includes zoom and save.
1.3.1: Submit the correct version to BigBoss
1.3.2: Make it possible to access native Instagram share sheet on own posts
Change save and share buttons to activate on inside touch events
Redo settings as a popup to fix black screen on iOS 9
Add done button to web view
Potentially fix freezing on app start
1.3.3: Fix 7.9 crash when zooming on profile pics
Fix 7.9 crash when using account switcher
